userStories.title: List Sessions Backend
userStories.description: As a system, I want to scan the session directory and list available sessions sorted by date.
acceptanceCriteria: Returns list of sessions with ID, path, lastModified
Reads first few lines for preview (optional)

userStories.title: Interactive Selection UI
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see a list of sessions and pick one to resume.
acceptanceCriteria: Display numbered list of last 10 sessions
Allow user to select by index
